moves.name: Leech Life
moves.effect: The more damage dealt to the target, the more this move restores the user’s HP.

moves.name: Dire Hit All +
moves.effect: Raises the critical-hit rate of all allied sync pairs by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Alola Lang Syne!
moves.effect: Applies the Status Condition Defense effect to the allied field of play. Raises the evasiveness of all allied sync pairs by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Move Gauge Boost
moves.effect: Charges the user’s move gauge by 3.

passives.name: Team Sync Regen
passives.description: Applies the Gradual Healing effect to all allied sync pairs after the user uses a sync move.

passives.name: Queue Cutter 1
passives.description: Has a chance (20%) of reducing the user’s sync move countdown by one when an opponent’s attack move targeting the user misses.

passives.name: Team Outmuscle 1
passives.description: Has a chance (20%) of raising the Attack of all allied sync pairs by one stat rank when an opponent’s attack move targeting the user misses.

grid.bonus: Dire Hit All:MP Refresh 2- Has a chance (30%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Move Gauge Boost:MP Refresh 2- Has a chance (30%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Leech Life:Master Healer 1- Increases the amount of HP restored by the user’s healing moves.
Leech Life:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Leech Life:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Alola Lang Syne!:MP Refresh 2- Has a chance (30%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Endurance- When the user enters battle with full HP, applies the Enduring effect to it.
Wide Awake- Prevents the user from falling asleep.
Fast Runner- Evasiveness cannot be lowered.
Ridicure 1- Has a chance (20%) of restoring the user’s HP by approximately 20% of its maximum HP when an opponent’s attack move targeting the user misses.
Toughen Up 3- Has a chance (40%) of raising the user’s Defense by one stat rank when it is hit by an attack move.
Fail Forward 1- Charges the user’s move gauge by 1 when an opponent’s attack move targeting the user misses.
Interference Immunity- Prevents the user from flinching, becoming confused, or becoming trapped.
Slippery Slope 9- Raises the user’s evasiveness by one stat rank when an opponent’s attack move targeting the user misses.
